content.query:
SELECT
    CONVERT(DATE, created_at, 23) as created_at
    ,COUNT(*) as active_subscriptions
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Enterprise' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enterprise_active
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Enterprise' AND payment_frequency='Monthly') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enterprise_active_monthly
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Enterprise' AND payment_frequency='Annual') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enterprise_active_annual
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Teams' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as teams_active
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Teams' AND payment_frequency='Monthly') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as teams_active_monthly
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Teams' AND payment_frequency='Annual') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as teams_active_annual
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Families' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as families_active
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Other' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as other_active
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Premium') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as personal_premium_active
FROM [dbo].[subscriptions]
WHERE (status!='canceled')
GROUP BY CONVERT(DATE, created_at, 23)
ORDER BY created_at;
